categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic divisions

nodes.text: The 203rd Division was a clone trooper unit dispatched to New Plympto during the final days of the Clone Wars. They later became part of the Imperial forces that remained behind on the planet to round up any surviving Nosaurians. The 203rd Division contained a number of V-wing starfighters, one of which was stolen by Dass Jennir during his second escape from the planet, which also resulted in almost all of the grounded civilian ships escaping in the process. The incident was later reported to Commander Appo of the 501st Legion by Vill.
